title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy Smart Tag $24, Anker speaker Gold Box sale from $30, more
content:
All of today’s best deals kick off with the first discount in months on the Samsung Galaxy SmartTag at $24. Plus, an Anker Bluetooth speaker Gold Box sale from $30 and these ongoing Galaxy S22 series pre-order price cuts. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch.

more…
